name: pulsed
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
past simple and past participle of
pulse
[ I ] to move or beat with a strong, regular rhythm: I could feel the blood pulsing through my veins.
[ I or T ] to mix food by switching a food processor (= an electric machine for cutting or mixing food) on and off again quickly: Place the prawns in a food processor and pulse to a coarse paste.
